tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE geofence_reports (
  report_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  location_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  geofence_radius INT NOT NULL,
  target_population INT NOT NULL,
  campaign_start_date DATE,
  campaign_end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE geofence_report (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE NOT NULL,
  end_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE marketing_efforts (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  target_audience VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  budget DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE NOT NULL,
  end_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE geofence_locations (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_name TEXT,
    latitude FLOAT,
    longitude FLOAT,
    radius INT
);

CREATE TABLE marketing_campaigns (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    budget DECIMAL,
    target_audience TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE geofences (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 latitude DOUBLE PRECISION NOT NULL,
 longitude DOUBLE PRECISION NOT NULL,
 radius INT NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE reports (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
 geofence_id INT NOT NULL,
 total_visits INT NOT NULL,
 UNIQUE (date, geofence_id),
 FOREIGN KEY (geofence_id) REFERENCES geofences(id) ON DELETE CASCADE);

CREATE TABLE campaigns (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 start_date DATE NOT NULL,
 end_date DATE NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE campaign_reports (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 campaign_id INT NOT NULL,
 report_id INT NOT NULL,
 UNIQUE (campaign_id, report_id),
 FOREIGN KEY (campaign_id) REFERENCES campaigns(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
 FOREIGN KEY (report_id) REFERENCES reports(id) ON DELETE CASCADE);

CREATE TABLE geofences (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    location_geometry GEOGRAPHY,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE marketing_campaigns (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    budget DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE campaign_history (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT,
    geofence_id INT,
    report_date DATE,
    impressions INT,
    clicks INT,
    conversions INT
);

CREATE TABLE marketing_metrics (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT,
    report_date DATE,
    impressions INT,
    clicks INT,
    conversions INT
);
